name: Valentina
description:
By Lily T., Dylan D., and Pallavi S.

International pop-sensation, Valentina, is about to go on the biggest tour of her life, traveling coast-to-coast to sing her biggest hits and to meet her most loyal fans! Join her as she posts on her social media, performs on stage, and signs autographs and deals with the paparazzi! Everything seems magical, but everything is not what it seems: your most loyal follower may be your worst nightmare...

*It is important to notice any odd characters or situations that may come up periodically throughout the game, become shady interactions may decline your score

Controls: Mouse (in order to drag/drop objects and to click the buttons according to the directions given on the page)
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
